original: etat sarvaṃ jñātvā kṛtakṛtyaḥ syāt // Tats_24 //
etatparaṃ yāthārthyaṃ etajjñātvā kṛtakṛtyaḥ syānna punastrividhaduḥkhenābhibhūyate // Tats_25 //
analyzed: etad param yāthārthyam etat jñātvā kṛtakṛtyaḥ syāt na punar trividha duḥkhena abhibhūyate
of the sāṃkhyasūtras cf separate file

original: nāsau punaḥ trividhena duḥkhenābhibhūyate nābhibhīyate / Tats_2.18 /
analyzed: na asau punar trividhena duḥkhena abhibhūyate na abhibhīyate  /
